name: Ultra Monsters!
description:
Defend your school and the world from the evil Dark Schippie Dues. Or don't. Starring Ultra Mint!

Controls

WASD - Move Ultra Mint

1-6 - Switch Active Monster

Left click - Place monster

Pick up yellow/blue cards in order to summon more monsters. Pick up inspirational blue tweets to keep your ego up.

Incredible features, including:

  • Unlockable monsters!
  • Basic particle effects!
  • Multiple endings which decide which skill you learn!
  • Unstable and poorly performing code!
  • No sound because I ran out of time!

Unlock endless mode by finishing the game! (Or by left clicking the 'e' in "Ultra Monsters" in the main menu). Fight against endless waves of enemies until you get bored, crash the browser, or fry your computer!

Thanks to Kyle for the motivation to learn some game dev basics and finish a game after saying anyone in chat could make a game better than that fighting game.
